title: Circular flow shows firms produce, sell goods

content.question: The circular-flow model indicates that final goods are produced by

choices.label: firms and sold in the factor markets
firms and sold in the product markets
firms and sold in the resource markets
households and sold in the factor markets
households and sold in the product markets

content.answer: firms and sold in the product markets

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
